argumentText:
ARGUMENT | Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression | |---|---|---|---| | 1 | | idi.1 | |- ph | | 2 | | #P_id | |- ( ph -> ph ) | | 3 | 1, 2 | #P_e0a | |- ph | \ Virtual deduction proof of ~ idiALT . The following user's proof is completed by invoking mmj2's unify command and using mmj2's StepSelector to pick all remaining steps of the Metamath proof.
h1:: ` |- ph `
qed:1,?: ~ e0a ` |- ph `
